election_record.label: Vermont 1818 Governor

overview.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 15248 votes for Jonas Galusha, 412 votes for Charles Marsh, 144 votes for Isaac Tichenor and 106 votes for Chauncey Langdon; however, the sum of votes per county is 15480 votes for Galusha, 422 for Marsh, 187 for Tichenor and 107 for Langdon.

The Vermont Gazette (Bennington, VT), The Christian Messenger (Middlebury, VT), The Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT), The Vermont Republican and American Yeoman (Windsor, VT), The Vermont Journal (Windsor, VT), The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), and The Northern Sentinel (Burlington, VT) report 15243 votes for Jonas Galusha and 749 scattering votes.
The Vermont Gazette (Bennington, VT), October 13, reports 412 votes for Charles Marsh.

The Northern Sentinel (Burlington, VT), October 16, North Star (Danville, VT), October 16, The Vermont Republican and American Yeoman (Windsor, VT), October 19, The Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT), October 19, The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), October 20 and Christian Messenger (Middlebury, VT), October 21: "PRINTED VOTES. On canvassing the votes for Gov. etc. the present session, it was found that a considerable number of the votes were printed. A question arose before the canvassing committee, whether by the constitution they could be counted--considerable debate arose--but on examining the constitution, it was decided by a large majority, to reject the printed votes."

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 26 scattering votes in Addison County; however, the sum of totals per town is 27. With the addition of information from individual town records, the total number of scattering votes is 36.

sub_unit.name: Bridport
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 3 unspecified scattering votes in Bridport.

sub_unit.name: Bennington
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 1133 votes for Jonas Galusha; however, the sum of totals per town is 1235.

sub_unit.name: Bennington
sub_unit.note: The Bennington Town Records does not list any scattering votes.

sub_unit.name: Pownal
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 1 unspecified scattering vote in Pownal.

sub_unit.name: Shaftsbury
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 133 votes for Jonas Galusha Bridport.

sub_unit.name: Caledonia
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 205 votes for Charles Marsh in Caledonia County.

sub_unit.name: Burke
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 51 votes for Jonas Galusha and 11 votes for Charles Marsh in Burke.

sub_unit.name: Saint Johnsbury
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 2 votes for Charles Marsh in Saint Johnsbury.

sub_unit.name: Chittenden
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 46 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Chittenden County.

sub_unit.name: Burlington
sub_unit.note: The Official Election Returns tally sheet lists 2 unspecified scattering votes that aren't on the Burlington Town Records.

sub_unit.name: Colchester
sub_unit.note: The Official Election Returns tally sheet lists 59 votes for Jonas Galusha in Colchester, and places the 1 vote for Isaac Tichenor in the results for Charlotte rather than for Colchester.

sub_unit.name: Jericho
sub_unit.note: The Official Election Returns tally sheet lists 2 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Jericho.

sub_unit.name: Granby
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Granby.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 893 votes for Jonas Galusha and 207 votes for Charles Marsh in Franklin County.

sub_unit.name: Fairfax
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet and Journal of the Vermont General Assembly list 76 votes for Jonas Galusha, 36 votes for Charles Marsh and 2 unspecified scattering votes in Fairfax; however, the Fairfax Town Records lists 79 votes for Galusha, 35 votes for Asa Lyon and no votes for either Marsh or any other scattering.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: In 1818, the town of Huntsburgh was renamed Franklin.

sub_unit.name: Johnson
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists one vote for unspecified scattering and no votes for Charles Marsh in Johnson.

sub_unit.name: Newbury
sub_unit.note: The History of Newbury, Vermont, 357, reports 117 votes for Jonas Galusha.

sub_unit.name: Hyde Park
sub_unit.note: The Journal of the Vermont General Assembly lists 38 votes for Jonas Galusha in Hyde Park.

sub_unit.name: Kellyvale
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 5 votes for Jonas Galusha and no scattering votes; however, the Kellyvale Town Records lists 4 votes for Galusha and 23 votes for Isaac Tichenor.

sub_unit.name: Troy
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Troy.

sub_unit.name: Westfield
sub_unit.note: Among the votes for Jonas Galusha in Westfield, 30 are Republican and 11 are Federalist.

sub_unit.name: Rutland
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns list 2254 votes for Jonas Galusha in Rutland County; however, the sum of totals per town is 2244.

sub_unit.name: Ira
sub_unit.note: According to the Original Election Returns tally sheet, the votes in Ira were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Middletown
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 106 votes for Jonas Galusha in Middletown.

sub_unit.name: Northfield
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 5 unspecified scattering votes rather than 4 votes for Dudley Chase and 1 other scattering vote.

sub_unit.name: Stow
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet lists 14 unspecified scattering votes as well as 14 votes for Dudley Chase; however, the Stowe Town Records lists only the 14 votes for Chase.

sub_unit.name: Worcester
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Worcester.

sub_unit.name: Windham
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 1296 votes for Jonas Galusha in Windham County; however, the sum of totals per town is 1423.

sub_unit.name: Rockingham
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns tally sheet and Journal of the Vermont General Assembly list 29 votes for Jonas Galusha in Rockingham; however, the Rockingham Town Records lists 148 votes.

sub_unit.name: Somerset
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 9 votes for Jonas Galusha in Somerset; however, the Rockingham Town Records lists 9 votes.

sub_unit.name: Townshend
sub_unit.note: Collections Relating to the History and Inhabitants of the Town of Townshend, Vermont, 229, reports 28 votes for Jonas Galusha.

sub_unit.name: Whitingham
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 90 votes for Jonas Galusha in Whitingham; however, the Whitingham Town Records lists 87 votes.

sub_unit.name: Windham
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 8 votes for Jonas Galusha in Windham; however, the Windham Town Records lists 59 votes.

sub_unit.name: Baltimore
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Baltimore.

sub_unit.name: Rochester
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns lists 36 votes for Jonas Galusha in Rochester; however, the Rochester Town Records lists 86 votes.

sub_unit.name: Weston
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Weston.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. Vermont State Archives, Middlesex.
Journal of the Vermont General Assembly, 1818. 174-176.
Vermont Intelligencer, and Bellows Falls Advertiser (Bellows Falls, VT). October 19, 1818.
Vermont Republican and American Yeoman (Windsor, VT). October 19, 1818.
Fairbanks, Edward Taylor. The Town of St. Johnsbury VT: a review of one hundred and twenty-five years to the anniversary pageant 1912. St. Johnsbury, VT: The Cowles Press, 1914. 571.
Phelps, James Houghton. Collections Relating to the History and Inhabitants of the Town of Townshend, Vermont. Townshend, VT: G.E. Selleck, 1877. 229.
Wells, Frederick P. History of Newbury, Vermont. St. Johnsbury, VT: The Caledonian, 1902. 357.
